text.content:
Crushed Intestines

Normal damage. Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Wounded]{Wounded 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} until it is no longer wounded.

Bludgeoning

Lodged in the Bone

Crit Effect: The target takes @Damage[1d6[bleed]].

Piercing

Severed Spine

Crit Effect: The target must succeed at a @Check[fortitude] or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed] until healed.

Slashing

Psychic Overflow

The target takes @Damage[1d8[mental]] damage.

Bomb or Spell
